text: Timothy Lancaster West CBE (20 October 1934 - 12 November 2024) was an English movie, stage and television actor. He was known for his roles as Bradley Hardacre in Brass, as King Francis in Ever After: A Cinderella Story, as Commissioner Berthier in The Day of the Jackal and as Stan Carter in EastEnders. West died at a care home in London, England from problems caused by a fall on 12 November 2024, aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== *LAMDA Biography *Timothy West at Gavin Barker Associates (agent) * * * Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Bradford Category:Accidental deaths from falls
title: Timothy West
